short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes an uploading process easy. Image URL will be copied to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is created to help SpreadSimple users to upload their images and store links in Google spreadsheet. 

Currently it supports UploadCare and Cloudinary as an upload provider.
